Author: rollerrat77
Text: Hey now. You've got this! I was in a similar position for a while with credit cards but I kid you not, Aldi was my game changer. I don't live far from one so I usually only buy a few days worth of food and then stop by when I feel like I need something. This way I don't eat an entire week in one night. Plus, where I live Aldi is cheaper than other stores so I use the money I save to pay down the principal.   Things happen, but you'll pull through it!
